title: 99: Chris Taylor: Everything You Want Is On the Other End of A Lot of Hard Work
itunes:title: 99: Chris Taylor: Everything You Want Is On the Other End of A Lot of Hard Work
description:
This week Jeremy interviews Chris Taylor of Pg.99

On this episode Chris and Jeremy talk Richmond and growing up in Virginia, Born Against, Cassingles, finding his artistic talent as a kid, seeing Green Day live, his first band Nit-Pic, naming the Pg99 albums Documents, being aware of the scene they were a part of, the impact they made posthumously, taking lyrics seriously, recording records with Kurt Ballou, the genesis of Malady, his favorite albums he designed, and so much more!

SUBSCRIBE TO THE PATREON to hear a bonus episode where Chris answered questions that were submitted by subscribers!

Follow the show on INSTAGRAM and TWITTER

Want some First Ever Podcast merch? Click here!
